original_title: ときめきメモリアルスーパーライブ
overview: This is the DVD edition of the Tokimeki Memorial Super Live held at Zepp Tokyo on October 26, 2002. From "Tokimeki Memorial" to "Tokimeki Memorial 3: In That Place of Promise", the live performances that responded to the passionate voices of the fans has now been immortalized.
title: Tokimeki Memorial Super Live
